content: उच्चाटनं {@--1@} Driving away, expulsion, removal from a place. {@--2@} Separation. {@--3@} Eradication, extirpation (of a plant). {@--4@} A kind of charm or magical incantation. {@--5@} Working this charm, ruining one's enemy, making a person leave his business by magical spells by making him disgusted with it.
